name: tailscale
title: Tailscale
description: List devices in your Tailnet and copy the IPv4, IPv6, or MagicDNS address to your clipboard.
author: samlinville

commands.name: devices
commands.title: All Devices
commands.subtitle: Tailscale
commands.description: View a list of every device in the tailnet

commands.name: my-devices
commands.title: My Devices
commands.subtitle: Tailscale
commands.description: View a list of your own devices

commands.name: account-switcher
commands.title: Switch Account
commands.subtitle: Tailscale
commands.description: View logged-in Tailscale accounts and quickly switch between them

commands.name: exit
commands.title: Exit Node
commands.subtitle: Tailscale
commands.description: View any available Exit node in your Tailnet and quickly activate one

preferences.name: adminConsoleURL
preferences.title: Admin Console URL
preferences.description: URL to the Tailscale Admin Console. Intended to be used with self-hosted Tailscale installations.

preferences.name: tailscalePath
preferences.title: Tailscale CLI Path
preferences.description: Location to the Tailscale CLI (Defaults to `/Applications/Tailscale.app/Contents/MacOS/Tailscale`)

preferences.name: tailscaleExecMaxBuffersMB
preferences.title: Buffer size for parsing CLI output (in megabytes)
preferences.description: Max buffer size (in megabytes, defaults to 10)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
